Package org.springframework.test.web.servlet

Class MockMvcBuilderSupport

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MockMvcBuilderSupport
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractMockMvcBuilder
public abstract class MockMvcBuilderSupport extends Object
Base class for MockMvc builder implementations, providing the capability to create a MockMvc instance.

DefaultMockMvcBuilder, which derives from this class, provides a concrete build method, and delegates to abstract methods to obtain a WebApplicationContext.

Since:
3.2
Author:
Rossen Stoyanchev, Rob Winch, Stephane Nicoll, Sam Brannen

    Delegates to createMockMvc(Filter[], MockServletConfig, WebApplicationContext, RequestBuilder, List, List, List) for creation of the MockMvc instance and configures that instance with the supplied defaultResponseCharacterEncoding.
